messages.title: On June 8th I’m voting for a strong local Labour MP.
messages.content:
As a Forces Veteran I know what it means to fight for what you believe in.
I trust Labour to fight for a Brexit deal that works for Yorkshire. A deal that secures jobs, wages and controls immigration.
The Tories have never been on our side.
We need a strong, independent-minded, Labour MP who will fight our corner.
Only a Labour MP will stand against the Tories’ cuts to our schools, our hospitals and our police.
In this election, stand with me and vote for a strong local Labour MP. Together, we can get the best deal for Yorkshire.

Labour will stand against Tory cuts to police.
